test-set.name: expath-file
test-set.description: Tests for the extension functions in the EXPath "file" package. The tests rely on being able to modify a “sandpit” folder. The sandpit element in the environment instructs the test driver to copy that folder to a “sandpit” directory in a temporary location and set the current working directory to that temporary location.
